name: Endless Arrow
description:
You control the archer's arrow and if your speed decreases enough to stop it's game over!

  • Increase your speed by hitting targets
  • Avoid haybales and bushes that will slow you down.
  • Don't hit cows or the fence!

A pixelart game made for Mini Jam 86: Sports with a limitation of "no stopping".

Programming by AquaMang
Art and Sound by HystericalFox
